alert.note: Alert for Northern Westchester; Putnam (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 13 at 6:40AM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT CENTRAL FAIRFIELD...NORTHERN WESTCHESTER AND EASTERN PUTNAM COUNTIES THROUGH 730 AM EDT... At 640 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms near Brewster, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Stamford, Danbury, New Canaan, Mount Kisco, Mahopac, Lake Carmel, Sherman, Brewster, Newtown, Greenwich, Ridgefield, Bethel, Wilton, Brookfield, and New Fairfield. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
